title: Riot should immediately suspend people who tell others to kill themselves.
body: Wow, didn't expect coming out of a game of League would make me so mad. I had garen because teemo was countered hard by the enemy champion going top. Well, I'm not too experienced with him and so I am not the best. I build my first item, and immediately the Zac starts to flame me for literally no reason. That continues for the entire game which is about 30 minutes. After the game, the jhin and zac flame me for building 1 item that didnt go with my build. A, they literally told me to go a different build. B, I wasn't familiar with Garen. Then, before they leave, the zac says I should kill myself. I said something like are you kidding me? He then goes on to say,"yeah you really should," then leaves. Are people so angry at this game that they don't care if they actually caused suicide? Suggestion: Auto-Detect people who say that and suspend them for a day or two. If they are saying that, they shouldn't be permitted to play this game. Do you agree or disagree?
